page.title: 15Services in Wooler
page.content: Wooler provides services for a wide- spread rural community.There is a Fire Station but the firemen all do other jobs as well as manning the fire engines.There is a new Ambulance Stat- ion, but they have to be called out from Newcastle.There is quite a large Police Station but not many policemen to occupy it. The town has two doctors' surgeries and a clinic. There is also a dentist who comes to the clinic and a physiot- herapist.Wooler also has two chiropod- ists.The nearest hospitals are at Aln- wick and Berwick. There is a Library and a Community Centre.The Archbold Hall is used for other community events as is Glendale School.
